verses.verse: Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> The gate <WH8179> of the inner <WH6442> court <WH2691> that looketh <WH6437> toward the east <WH6921> shall be <WH1961> shut <WH5462> the six <WH8337> working <WH4639> days; <WH3117> but on the sabbath <WH3117> <WH7676> it shall be opened, <WH6605> and in the day <WH3117> of the new moon <WH2320> it shall be opened. <WH6605>

And the prince <WH5387> shall enter <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the porch <WH197> of that gate <WH8179> without, <WH4480> <WH2351> and shall stand <WH5975> by <WH5921> the post <WH4201> of the gate, <WH8179> and the priests <WH3548> shall prepare <WH6213> <WH853> his burnt offering <WH5930> and his peace offerings, <WH8002> and he shall worship <WH7812> at <WH5921> the threshold <WH4670> of the gate: <WH8179> then he shall go forth; <WH3318> but the gate <WH8179> shall not <WH3808> be shut <WH5462> until <WH5704> the evening. <WH6153>

Likewise the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall worship <WH7812> at the door <WH6607> of this <WH1931> gate <WH8179> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> in the sabbaths <WH7676> and in the new moons. <WH2320>

And the burnt offering <WH5930> that <WH834> the prince <WH5387> shall offer <WH7126> unto the LORD <WH3068> in the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> shall be six <WH8337> lambs <WH3532> without blemish, <WH8549> and a ram <WH352> without blemish. <WH8549>

And the meat offering <WH4503> shall be an ephah <WH374> for a ram, <WH352> and the meat offering <WH4503> for the lambs <WH3532> as he shall be able to give, <WH4991> <WH3027> and a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> to an ephah. <WH374>

And in the day <WH3117> of the new moon <WH2320> it shall be a young <WH1121> <WH1241> bullock <WH6499> without blemish, <WH8549> and six <WH8337> lambs, <WH3532> and a ram: <WH352> they shall be <WH1961> without blemish. <WH8549>

And he shall prepare <WH6213> a meat offering, <WH4503> an ephah <WH374> for a bullock, <WH6499> and an ephah <WH374> for a ram, <WH352> and for the lambs <WH3532> according as <WH834> his hand <WH3027> shall attain <WH5381> unto, and a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> to an ephah. <WH374>
And when the prince <WH5387> shall enter, <WH935> he shall go in <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the porch <WH197> of that gate, <WH8179> and he shall go forth <WH3318> by the way <WH1870> thereof.

But when the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall come <WH935> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> in the solemn feasts, <WH4150> he that entereth in <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the north <WH6828> gate <WH8179> to worship <WH7812> shall go out <WH3318> by the way <WH1870> of the south <WH5045> gate; <WH8179> and he that entereth <WH935> by the way <WH1870> of the south <WH5045> gate <WH8179> shall go forth <WH3318> by the way <WH1870> of the north <WH6828> gate: <WH8179> he shall not <WH3808> return <WH7725> by the way <WH1870> of the gate <WH8179> whereby <WH834> he came in, <WH935> but <WH3588> shall go forth <WH3318> over against <WH5227> it.
And the prince <WH5387> in the midst <WH8432> of them, when they go in, <WH935> shall go in; <WH935> and when they go forth, <WH3318> shall go forth. <WH3318>

And in the feasts <WH2282> and in the solemnities <WH4150> the meat offering <WH4503> shall be <WH1961> an ephah <WH374> to a bullock, <WH6499> and an ephah <WH374> to a ram, <WH352> and to the lambs <WH3532> as he is able to give, <WH4991> <WH3027> and a hin <WH1969> of oil <WH8081> to an ephah. <WH374>

Now when <WH3588> the prince <WH5387> shall prepare <WH6213> a voluntary <WH5071> burnt offering <WH5930> or <WH176> peace offerings <WH8002> voluntarily <WH5071> unto the LORD, <WH3068> one shall then open <WH6605> him <WH853> the gate <WH8179> that looketh <WH6437> toward the east, <WH6921> and he shall prepare <WH6213> <WH853> his burnt offering <WH5930> and his peace offerings, <WH8002> as <WH834> he did <WH6213> on the sabbath <WH7676> day: <WH3117> then he shall go forth; <WH3318> and after <WH310> his going forth <WH3318> one shall shut <WH5462> <WH853> the gate. <WH8179>

Thou shalt daily <WH3117> prepare <WH6213> a burnt offering <WH5930> unto the LORD <WH3068> of a lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> without blemish: <WH8549> thou shalt prepare <WH6213> it every morning. <WH1242> <WH1242>

And thou shalt prepare <WH6213> a meat offering <WH4503> for <WH5921> it every morning, <WH1242> <WH1242> the sixth part <WH8345> of an ephah, <WH374> and the third part <WH7992> of a hin <WH1969> of oil, <WH8081> to temper <WH7450> <WH853> with the fine flour; <WH5560> a meat offering <WH4503> continually <WH8548> by a perpetual <WH5769> ordinance <WH2708> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
Thus shall they prepare <WH6213> <WH853> the lamb, <WH3532> and the meat offering, <WH4503> and the oil, <WH8081> every morning <WH1242> <WH1242> for a continual <WH8548> burnt offering. <WH5930>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> If <WH3588> the prince <WH5387> give <WH5414> a gift <WH4979> unto any <WH376> of his sons, <WH4480> <WH1121> the inheritance <WH5159> thereof shall be <WH1961> his sons'; <WH1121> it <WH1931> shall be their possession <WH272> by inheritance. <WH5159>

But if <WH3588> he give <WH5414> a gift <WH4979> of his inheritance <WH4480> <WH5159> to one <WH259> of his servants, <WH4480> <WH5650> then it shall be <WH1961> his to <WH5704> the year <WH8141> of liberty; <WH1865> after it shall return <WH7725> to the prince: <WH5387> but <WH389> his inheritance <WH5159> shall be <WH1961> his sons' <WH1121> for them.

Moreover the prince <WH5387> shall not <WH3808> take of the people's inheritance by oppression, <WH3947> <WH5971> <WH4480> <WH5159> to thrust them out <WH3238> of their possession; <WH4480> <WH272> but he shall give <WH853> his sons <WH1121> inheritance <WH5157> out of his own possession: <WH4480> <WH272> that <WH4616> <WH834> my people <WH5971> be not <WH3808> scattered <WH6327> every man <WH376> from his possession. <WH4480> <WH272>

After he brought <WH935> me through the entry, <WH3996> which <WH834> was at <WH5921> the side <WH3802> of the gate, <WH8179> into <WH413> the holy <WH6944> chambers <WH3957> of <WH413> the priests, <WH3548> which looked <WH6437> toward the north: <WH6828> and, behold, <WH2009> there <WH8033> was a place <WH4725> on the two sides <WH3411> westward. <WH3220>

Then said <WH559> he unto <WH413> me, This <WH2088> is the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> the priests <WH3548> shall boil <WH1310> <WH853> the trespass offering <WH817> and the sin offering, <WH2403> where <WH834> they shall bake <WH644> the meat offering; <WH4503> that they bear them not out <WH3318> <WH1115> into <WH413> the utter <WH2435> court, <WH2691> to sanctify <WH6942> <WH853> the people. <WH5971>

Then he brought me forth <WH3318> into <WH413> the utter <WH2435> court, <WH2691> and caused me to pass <WH5674> by <WH413> the four <WH702> corners <WH4740> of the court; <WH2691> and, behold, <WH2009> in every corner of the court <WH4740> <WH2691> <WH2691> <WH4740> <WH2691> there was a court. <WH2691>

In the four <WH702> corners <WH4740> of the court <WH2691> there were courts <WH2691> joined <WH7000> of forty <WH705> cubits long <WH753> and thirty <WH7970> broad: <WH7341> these four <WH702> corners <WH7106> were of one <WH259> measure. <WH4060>

And there was a row <WH2905> of building round about <WH5439> in them, round about <WH5439> them four, <WH702> and it was made <WH6213> with boiling places <WH4018> under <WH4480> <WH8478> the rows <WH2918> round about. <WH5439>

Then said <WH559> he unto <WH413> me, These <WH428> are the places <WH1004> of them that boil, <WH1310> where <WH834> <WH8033> the ministers <WH8334> of the house <WH1004> shall boil <WH1310> <WH853> the sacrifice <WH2077> of the people. <WH5971>
